knowledge: Meningitis Meningitis  The most common fungal meningitis is cryptococcal meningitis due to Cryptococcus neoformans. Meningitis may occur as the result of several non-infectious causes: spread of cancer to the meninges  and certain drugs  Meningitis Meningitis
